body.section: Hierarchy SpinalCordAssessment is a kind of SpinalCordEvent

section.title: Description
section.p: Contains the Code Set that identifies the type of score for the Assessment tool. ASIA, FIM, FAM CHARTSF etc.
Contains the Code Set that identifies the tyepe of score for the Assessment tool.

stentry.p: Contains the calculated value for the Affected Pain Rating Index for the patient. Contains the rating value for the patient s subjective measurement of affective pain.

Contains the codes that identify the type Assessment Form the Patient informations is being gathered for. ie. ASIA, FIN FAM CHARTSFetc Contains the code set that identifies the Assessment Instrument ( form) ie. SWLS, FIM, ASIA, CHART-SF, FAM, DUSOI-A etc.
Contains the calculated value for the BMI or Body Mass Index Contains the BMI dcore for the veteran.
Contains Cognitive Assessment value for veteran Contains Cognitive Assessment value for veteran
Contains the diagnostic health problem assessment value for the veteran Contains the diagnostic health problem assessment value for the veteran
Contains the highest Nreuorlogical Level score for the veteran.
Unique identifier for the SpinalCordAssessment Contains the unique identifier for the Assessment Tool
Contains the Impairment Scale value for the veteran.
Contains the mental component assessment value for the veteran Contains the mental component assessment value for the veteran
Contains Motor Assessment value for veteran Contains Motor Assessment value for veteran
Contains the subscore for the veteran overall Depression Contains the subscore for the veteran overall Depression
Contains the subscore for the veteran overall Health. Contains the subscore for the veteran overall Health
Contains the subscore for the veteran overall Independance Contains the subscore for the veteran overall Independance
Contains the scale value for the patient s overall pain. Contains the calculated value for the pain scale.
Contains the physical component assessment value for the veteran Contains the physical component assessment value for the veteran
Contains the total score for the Assessment tool Contains the total score for the Assessment tool
Contains the calculated value for the Sensory Pain Rating Index for the patient. Contains the rating value for the patient s subjective measurement of sensory pain.
Contains the calculated value for the Total Pain Rating Index for the patient. Contains the patient s total rating value for subjective measurement of pain.
Contains the calculated value for the Visual Anaolog Scale for the patient. Contains the scale value for the patient s visual analogue.
Contains information that is pertinent to Assessment grouping or Section on the Assessment to Association to the class that identifies the Assessment section or grouping on the assessment tool.
Contains information regarding attendant care for the spinal cord injury patient
Association to the class that identifies the value which indicates numeric goal for spinal Cord injury patient's rehabilitation.

"An entity entering the data into the originating system. The data entry entity is collected optionally for internal quality control purposes. This includes the transcriptionist for dictated text transcribed into electronic form." - HL7 V3.
